text: Hoder may refer to: * Hoder (Marvel Comics), fictional character * Susanne Hoder, member of the United Methodist Church New England Conference, politically active in the Israeli–Palestinian conflict * Hossein Derakhshan (born 1975), Iranian-born Canadian journalist nicknamed "Hoder" * 4669 Høder, main belt asteroid ==See also== * Höðr, Norse mythological figure * Hodder (disambiguation) * Hodor (disambiguation)
title: Hoder
